titleStmt.title: Liberty of conscience, asserted and vindicated by a learned country-gentleman ...
titleStmt.author: Care, George.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Preface signed "G.C.", doubtfully identified by Halkett & Laing and by the McAlpin and BM catalogues as George Care.
Attributed to George Care. cf. Wing.
